import React from "react" import { NavbarItems } from "./NavbarItems" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import logo from '../images/logo.png' import "../style.css" import "./Navbar.css" export default function Navbar({ size, toggleCart }) { const [navbarIcon, setNavbarIcon] = React.useState("fas fa-bars") //Initialize menu icon const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = React.useState(false) //Init state -> closed function handleNavbar() { setNavbarIcon(prevIcon => prevIcon === "fas fa-bars" ? "fas fa-times" : "fas fa-bars"); setMenuOpen(prevOpen => !prevOpen) // toggle the menu open/closed } return (
{/*
